evidence.claim: Dandy uses AWS for scalable cloud infrastructure and services.
The platform is designed with HIPAA compliance ensuring secure handling of health information.
Dandy utilizes FHIR for health data interoperability.
They support various X12 transaction sets necessary for billing and claims processing.
Dandy's architecture involves API-driven models for flexible integration.

icp.icp_reason: Dandy specializes in health tech and supports X12 EDI transactions, indicating ICP alignment.
matched_use_cases: X12 EDI transactions for eligibility and claims
API automation for healthcare data exchange
Remittance processing using HIPAA compliant standards
